response.overview: In the bleak days of the Cold War, espionage veteran George Smiley is forced from semi-retirement to uncover a Soviet mole within his former colleagues at the heart of MI6.
response.tagline: How do you find an enemy who is hidden right before your eyes?
response.title: Tinker Tailor Soldier Spy
